title: Who Are Rishi Sunakâ€™s Top Cabinet Ministers?
description: The new prime minister named people with high-level experience, several of them to posts they have held before, sending a message of stability after a period of upheaval.
dc:creator: Megan Specia
media:description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak of Britain appointed cabinet members on Tuesday, mostly drawing on lawmakers who have held prominent positions in the past.
